Method Detail

accept

public boolean accept(java.lang.Object o)
An object will be accepted (i.e. this method will return true) if it is a jess.Fact and, if a Deftemplate was provided to the constructor, the object's Deftemplate is the same. Also:
  • if the object is a context definition fact, its id must match the contract id passed to the constructor
  • if the object is a contextual-info or institutional-reality-element fact, its context must match the contract id passed to the constructor

Specified by:
accept in interface jess.Filter
